description: Volume ids through the ec2 api are showing up as # instead of vol-#.  This makes many of the ec2 commands related to volumes fail.
title: volume ids are messed up in ec2_api

comments.content: Volume ids through the ec2 api are showing up as # instead of vol-#.  This makes many of the ec2 commands related to volumes fail.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda

comments.content: I think this has been resolved, will verify
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~termie

comments.content: Looks fixed to me, shows up as vol-#, creates, describes and deletes alright. Marking as FixCommitted, please reopen if you can point to a more specific failure.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
